input_data.title: New Amsterdam
input_data.overview: John Amsterdam is a New York homicide detective unlike any other. He is brilliant, mysterious, reckless, and immortal. In 1642 he saved a Native Indian girl during a massacre of her indigenous tribe. In return, the girl cast an ancient spell that conferred immortality upon him. Amsterdam will not age, she told him, until he finds his one true love.

response.analytical_summary: New Amsterdam is a neo-noir crime drama series centered on John Amsterdam, an immortal detective navigating the criminal underworld of New York City. The show blends police procedural elements with a supernatural premise, exploring themes of loneliness, redemption, and the burden of eternal life. Amsterdam's unique condition forces him to confront the cyclical nature of violence and the fleeting nature of human connection, creating a melancholic and introspective tone. The series examines the moral complexities of justice and the personal cost of immortality.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with John Amsterdam, a brilliant but troubled homicide detective, investigating crimes in modern-day New York. Unbeknownst to most, Amsterdam is immortal, cursed with eternal life after saving a Native American girl centuries prior. The girl, in gratitude, cast a spell that prevents him from aging, but only until he finds his true love. Throughout the series, Amsterdam grapples with the isolation of his condition, witnessing the passage of time and the loss of loved ones while remaining unchanged. He investigates a variety of cases, often encountering individuals connected to his past and the origins of his immortality. As he delves deeper into the mysteries surrounding his condition, he uncovers a network of individuals who are aware of his immortality and seek to exploit it. The search for his true love becomes a driving force, though the nature of that love and its potential to break the curse remains elusive, leading him on a complex and often heartbreaking journey through the city's underbelly and his own troubled past.
response.keyword_sentence: New Amsterdam is a gritty neo-noir crime drama set in modern-day New York City, exploring themes of immortality, loneliness, and the burden of eternal life through the eyes of a troubled detective cursed with a supernatural condition.
